title: Council Directive 91/148/EEC of 18 March 1991 revoking Directive 75/404/EEC on the restriction of the use of natural gas in power stations
header:
COUNCIL DIRECTIVE  of 18 March 1991  revoking Directive 75/404/EEC on the restriction of the use of natural gas in power stations  (91/148/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
